text: Using /dev/null in shell commands creates a literal 'nul' file on Windows - use NUL instead or the windows-null-sanitizer hook
Hooks can only block/allow commands, they cannot modify them directly - use JSON output with tool_input to modify
Always update CLAUDE.md after creating skills/agents/workflows - Router won't know about items not in CLAUDE.md
Agents must use Skill() tool to invoke skills, not just Read() the SKILL.md files
Task metadata must be updated with discoveries via TaskUpdate() for cross-session continuity
learnings.md grows unbounded - use session-based JSON storage with read-time truncation instead
saveSession() function exists but is NEVER invoked automatically - need SessionEnd hook to trigger session creation
